newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Top Pakistani classical singer dies in London.
newsitem.headline: Top Pakistani classical singer dies in London.

text.p: Pakistan's top classical singer Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan died on Saturday in a London hospital to which he had been admitted a few days earlier suffering from hepatitis, a close British friend said.
Iftikhar Quaisar said Khan, 49, died just before midday of a cardiac arrest. His body is to be flown back to Pakistan for a funeral, he added.

Pakistan's official APP news agency said the singer had left Pakistan for the United States last week for a kidney transplant but had stopped for a few days in London, where his condition deteriorated.
Nusrat popularised the subcontinent's traditional "Qawali" form of music and semi-classical Pakistani music in the West by mixing it with popular modern fast beats.
